extraDescription: Information Technology Project Manager Level 3 to direct and lead the Interprovincial Computerized Examination Management System redevelopment Project and manage the subsequent operation and maintenance of the Interprovincial Computerized Examination Management System 2
comments: This is a notice of the restatement of Contract G742111020 dated May 05, 2011. The contract was not captured by our financial system and the issue has been corrected since then. Request for goods or services.
